document.full_text: thousands of people thronged apple stores on both u.s. coasts as the ipad 2 went on sale on friday, signaling a strong appetite for a device that dominates the fledgling market it created.
document.title: big crowds greet apple's ipad 2
lines_and_colors: thousands of people thronged apple stores on both u.s. coasts as the ipad 2 went on sale on friday, signaling a strong appetite for a device that dominates the fledgling market it created.
